datums
  • Reference

Pauperism in England, 1871-1891 (Yearly Data)

Data on pauperism used in the 1899 article, “An Investigation into the Causes of Changes in Pauperism in England”, by Udny Yule, which is the first use of multiple regression. The data contains Yearly data on pauperism, the proportion of paupers provided for at home vs. the work house, population, and population over 65 for the Poor Law Unions of England for the years: 1871, 1881, and 1891.

pauperism_year

Format

A data frame with 1797 rows and 38 columns.

name type description
ID "numeric" ID
year "integer" Year
adultchabI "numeric" Ratio of Adult to Child Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
adultchabO "numeric" Ratio of Adult to Child Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
adultchnotabI "numeric" Ratio of Adult to Child Not Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
adultchnotabO "numeric" Ratio of Adult to Child Not Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
ChABI "numeric" Child Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
ChABO "numeric" Child Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
ChNotABI "numeric" Child Not Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
ChNotABO "numeric" Child Not Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
F65 "numeric" Females Aged 65+ in the Population
FABI "numeric" Female Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
FABO "numeric" Female Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
FNotABI "numeric" Female Not Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
FNotABO "numeric" Female Not Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
M65 "numeric" Males Aged 65+ in the Population
MABI "numeric" Male Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
MABO "numeric" Male Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
mfabI "numeric" Ratio of Male to Female Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
mfabO "numeric" Ratio of Male to Female Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
mfnotabI "numeric" Ratio of Male to Female Not Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
mfnotabO "numeric" Ratio of Male to Female Not Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
MNotABI "numeric" Male Not Able-Bodied In-Door Paupers
MNotABO "numeric" Male Not Able-Bodied Out-Door Paupers
outratio "numeric" Ratio of Out-Door Paupers to In-Door Paupers
outratiodiff "numeric" Ratio of outratio91 to outratio81
pauper "numeric" Proportion of Paupers in the Population
pauper2 "numeric" Proportion of Paupers in the Population correcting for border changes.
paupratiodiff "numeric" Ratio of Pauperism Proportion to previous decade
Popn "numeric" Population (from Census Population Abstracts)
Popn2 "numeric" Population allowing for boundary changes. This is the population number used by Yule.
PopnF "numeric" Female Population
PopnM "numeric" Male Population
popratiodiff "numeric" Ratio of Population to previous decade
PropF65 "numeric" Proportion of females aged 65+ in the female population
PropM65 "numeric" Proportion of males aged 65+ in the Male Population
Prop65 "numeric" Proportion of the population Aged 65+
oldratiodiff "numeric" Ratio of the proportion of Population Aged 65+ to the previous decade.

Details

See pauperism_plu for variables related to the Poor Law Unions.
